title: The Fed 'shouldn't use all their firepower immediately,' says CIO

title: Congress finally catches up to the ‘bitcon’ after Libra controversy

title: IMF sees dangers from trade tensions and says the dollar is overvalued
text: The International Monetary Fund on Wednesday said that the U.S. dollar was overvalued by 6% to 12%, based on near-term economic fundamentals, while the euro, Japan's yen and China's yuan were seen as broadly in line with fundamentals.

title: Asian stocks wobble, bond yields fall on earnings woes, trade worries

title: Crude futures fall after strong build in U.S. oil products stocks

title: Gold prices settle at a more than 6-year high
